We're not open yet

Stop Waking People Up

It's two in the morning and you just had an awesome idea that you think your friend will love, but, frankly, it's not so awesome that you want to wake them up with it.

How do you let them know?

All of your friends are hyper-connected. Any email you send might sound an alert on their phone, their tablet and even through the speakers of the computer they forgot to shut down.

They're not going to love you if you wake them up…

Even if they're awake, do you want to risk breaking their concentration at a critical moment?

Sometimes, you just don't need them to stop what they're doing to read your message.

It can wait…

No Alarms, No Popups

There are lots of ways to send a message that will get someone's attention. FFTI isn't one of them…

Use FFTI when you don't want to have your message pop up when they're sleeping, or working, or trying to live life a little less Pavlovian.

We're not open yet

It's really early in the first steps of this project. We're not even ready for alpha testers yet. Bear with us and something great should happen!

If you're interested…

Get on the list!

We're nowhere near ready to go live just yet, but if you'd like to be one of the first to use FFTI, sign up here:
